Verses: 1 pinnum Karththar Moseyai Nokki:

2 oruvan Karththarukku Virodhamaaga Aniyaayam Seydhu, Thanvasaththil Oppuvikkappatta Porulilaavadhu, Kodukkal Vaangalilaavadhu, Than Ayalaanukku Maaraattampanni, Alladhu Oru Vasthuvai Balaathkaaramaaip Pariththukkondu, Alladhu Than Ayalaanukku Idukkanseydhu,
3 alladhu Kaanaamarponadhaik Kandadaindhum Adhai Marudhaliththu, Adhaik Kuriththup Poiyaanaiyittu, Manidhar Seyyum Ivaimudhalaana Yaadhoru Kaariyaththil Paavancheydhaaneyaagil,

4 avan Seydha Paavaththinaale Kutravaaliyaanapadiyaal, Thaan Balaathkaaramaaip Pariththukkondadhaiyum, Idukkanseydhu Petrukkondadhaiyum, Than Vasaththile Oppuvikkappattadhaiyum, Kaanaamarpoyirundhu Thaan Kandeduththadhaiyum,

5 poiyaanaiyittu Sambaadhiththa Porulaiyum Thirumbakkodukkakkadavan; Andha Mudhalaikkodukkiradhum Allaamal, Adhinodu Aindhil Oru Pangu Adhigamaagavum Kootti, Adhaith Thaan Kutranivaaranapaliyai Idum Naalil, Adharkuriyavanukkuk Koduththuvittu,
6 than Kutranivaaranapaliyaaga, Un Madhippukku Sariyaana Pazhudhatra Aattukkadaavaik Karththarukku Seluththumpadi, Adhai Aasaariyanidaththil Kutranivaaranapaliyaagak Konduvaruvaanaaga.
7 karththarudaiya Sannidhiyil Avan Paavaththai Aasaariyan Nivirththi Seyyakkadavan; Appozhudhu Avan Kutravaaliyaaga Seydha Appadippatta Endhakkaariyamum Avanukku Mannikkappadum Endraar.
8 pinnum Karththar Moseyai Nokki:

9 nee Aaronukkum Avan Kumaararukkum Karpikkavendiya Sarvaanga Thaganapalikkuriya Pramaanam Ennavendraal, Sarvaanga Thaganapaliyaanadhu Raamuzhuvadhum Vidiyarkaalamattum Palipeedaththinmel Eriyavendum; Palipeedaththinmelulla Akkini Erindhukonde Irukkavendum.

10 aasaariyan Than Sanalnool Angiyaith Thariththu, Than Sanalnool Jalladaththai Araiyil Pottukkondu, Palipeedaththinmel Akkiniyil Erindha Sarvaanga Thaganapaliyin Saambalai Eduththu, Palipeedaththup Pakkaththil Kotti,
11 pinbu Than Vasthirangalaik Kazhatri, Veru Vasthirangalai Uduththikkondu, Andha Saambalaip Paalayaththukkup Purambe Suththamaana Oru Idaththile Kondupoik Kottakkadavan.

12 palipeedaththinmelirukkira Akkini Aviyaamal Erindhukondirukkavendum; Aasaariyan Kaalaidhorum Adhinmel Eriyumpadi Kattaigalaip Pottu Adhinmel Sarvaanga Thaganapaliyai Varisaiyaaga Vaiththu, Adhinmel Samaadhaana Paligalin Kozhuppaip Pottuth Thaganikkakkadavan.
13 palipeedaththinmel Akkini Eppozhudhum Erindhukondirukkavendum; Adhu Orupozhudhum Avindhupogalaagaadhu.
14 pojanapaliyin Pramaanam Ennavendraal, Aaronin Kumaarar Adhaik Karththarudaiya Sannidhiyil Palipeedaththukku Munne Padaikkavendum.

15 avan Pojanapaliyin Melliya Maavilum Adhin Enneyilum Than Kaippidi Niraiya Eduththu, Pojanapaliyinmelulla Thoobavarkkam Yaavatrodumkooda Adhai Gnaabagakkuriyaagap Palipeedaththinmel Karththarukku Sugandha Vaasanaiyaagath Thaganikkakkadavan.

16 adhil Meedhiyaanadhai Aaronum Avan Kumaararum Pusippaargalaaga; Adhu Pulippillaa Appaththudan Parisuththa Sthalaththil Pusikkappadakkadavadhu; Aasarippuk Koodaaraththin Praagaaraththil Adhaip Pusikkavendum.

17 adhaip Puliththamaavulladhaagap Paagampannavendaam; Adhu Enakku Idappadum Thaganangalil Naan Avargalukkuk Koduththa Avargaludaiya Pangu; Adhu Paavanivaarana Paliyaippolum Kutranivaarana Paliyaippolum Magaa Parisuththamaanadhu.

18 aaronin Pillaigalil Aanmakkal Yaavarum Adhaippusippaargalaaga; Karththarukku Idappadum Thaganapaligalil Adhu Ungal Thalaimuraidhorum Niththiya Kattalaiyaai Irukkakkadavadhu; Avaigalaith Thodugiravanevanum Parisuththamaai Iruppaan Endru Sol Endraar.
19 pinnum Karththar Moseyai Nokki:

20 aaron Abishegam Pannappadum Naalil, Avanum Avan Kumaararum Karththarukku Seluththavendiya Padaippu Ennavendraal, Oru Eppaa Alavaana Melliya Maavile Paththil Oru Pangai, Kaalaiyil Paadhiyum Maalaiyil Paadhiyum, Niththiya Pojanapaliyaaga Seluththakkadavargal.

21 adhu Sattiyile Enneyvittup Paagampannakkadavadhu; Paagampannappattapinbu Adhaik Konduvandhu, Pojanapaliyaagap Paagampannappatta Thundugalaik Karththarukku Sugandha Vaasanaiyaagap Padaikkakkadavaai.
22 avan Kumaararil Avanudaiya Sthalaththile Abishegampannappadugira Aasaariyanum Appadiye Seyyakkadavan; Adhu Muzhuvadhum Thaganikkappadavendum; Adhu Karththar Niyamiththa Niththiya Kattalai.
23 aasaariyanukkaaga Idappadum Endhappojanapaliyum Pusikkappadaamal, Muzhuvadhum Thaganikkappadavendum Endraar.
24 pinnum Karththar Moseyai Nokki:

25 nee Aaronodum Avan Kumaararodum Sollavendiyadhaavadhu, Paavanivaaranapaliyin Pramaanam Ennavendraal, Sarvaanga Thaganapali Kollappadum Idaththil Paavanivaaranapaliyum Karththarudaiya Sannidhiyil Kollappadakkadavadhu; Adhu Magaa Parisuththamaanadhu.
26 paavanivirththiseyya Adhaip Paliyidugira Aasaariyan Adhaippusikkakkadavan; Aasarippuk Koodaaraththin Praagaaramaagiya Parisuththa Sthalaththile Adhu Pusikkappadavendum.

27 adhin Maamsaththil Padugiradhu Edhuvum Parisuththamaayirukkum; Adhin Raththaththile Konjam Oru Vasthiraththil Theriththadhaanaal, Raththantheriththa Vasthiraththaip Parisuththa Sthalaththil Kazhuvavendum.
28 adhu Samaikkappatta Manpaandam Udaikkappadavendum: Seppuppaanaiyil Samaikkappattadhaanaal, Adhu Vilakkappattuth Thanneeril Kazhuvappadavendum.
29 aasaariyaril Aanmakkal Yaavarum Adhaippusippaargalaaga: Adhu Magaa Parisuththamaanadhu.

30 endhap Paavanivaaranapaliyin Raththaththil Konjam Parisuththa Sthalaththil Paavanivirththiyinporuttu Aasarippuk Koodaaraththukkulle Konduvarappattadho, Andhap Pali Pusikkappadalaagaadhu, Adhu Akkiniyile Thaganikkappadavendum.
